text: This obsoletes IRM 6.771.2 Grievance Examiner Handbook.

The material relating to the duties and responsibilities for handling grievances Ô¨Åled under the IRS Agency Grievance System (AGSs) by a grievance examiner previously contained IRM 6.77.2 is obsolete per interim guidance HCO-06-0517-0001,Interim Guidance on Agency Grievance System Procedures and Grievance Examiner Handbook dated September 12, 2017. The guidance contained in this IRM section is superseded by the guidance in contained in interim guidance HCO-06-0517-0001 dated September 12, 2017.
